items.question: What types of images can I enhance?
items.answer: You can enhance various types of images, including product photos, marketing visuals, social media graphics, and more. The AI works best with clear, well-lit images.

items.question: How long does the enhancement process take?
items.answer: Enhancement is typically completed in seconds, allowing you to get high-quality images quickly for your needs.

items.question: Can I adjust the level of enhancement?
items.answer: Yes! The enhancement levels can be adjusted to suit your preferences, giving you complete control over the final look of your images.

items.question: What is the quality of the enhanced images?
items.answer: The enhanced images maintain high resolution and clarity, ensuring they are suitable for professional use, including printing and digital platforms.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of images I can enhance?
items.answer: There is no limit! You can enhance as many images as you need, and our batch processing feature makes it easy to work with multiple files at once.

items.question: Do I own the rights to enhanced images?
items.answer: Yes! All images enhanced through WaveSpeed AI come with full ownership rights, allowing you to use them for any commercial purpose without restrictions.

items.question: What support is available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We offer extensive support through documentation, tutorials, and a responsive customer service team available for any inquiries.

items.question: Is there a free trial available for new users?
items.answer: Yes, new users receive free credits to test the enhancement features without any commitment or subscription.

items.question: What formats are supported for image uploads?
items.answer: You can upload images in JPG, PNG, and WebP formats to be enhanced with our tool.

cta.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Images?
